00044 class GameMap {
00045         public:
00046                 GameMap();
00047                 
00048                 //** Moves the onscreen position of the map upward
00049                 void MoveMapUp();
00050                 
00051                 //** Moves the onscreen position of the map downward
00052                 void MoveMapDown();
00053 
00054                 //** Moves the onscreen position of the map to the left
00055                 void MoveMapLeft();
00056 
00057                 //** Moves the onscreen position of the map to the right
00058                 void MoveMapRight();
00059 
00060                 //** Draws the map to the engine's main screen
00061                 void Draw( PlatformEngine* game );
00062 
00063         private:
00064                 //** The stack of layers

00066
